title: Major countries in bismuth mine production 2015 to 2019
summary: This grouped bar chart represents 10 different Countrys on X-axis for 5 groups 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018, and 2019. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Production in metric tons.
Country China had the maximum Production in metric tons among all 5 groups, and it was for 2018. The minimum Production in metric tons was observed in Country Laos for 2015.
Country China and Russia had the biggest gap of 13999.0 between the highest and lowest Production in metric tons found for 2018.
On average, the Country China had the highest Production in metric tons for all 5 groups 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018, and 2019. Whereas Bolivia had the lowest average Production in metric tons.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 10 different Countrys on X-axis for 5 groups 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018, and 2019. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Production in metric tons.
Out of all 5 groups, 2018 had the highest Production in metric tons for Country China and 2015 had the lowest Production in metric tons for Country Laos.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 10 different Countrys on X-axis for 5 groups 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018, and 2019. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Production in metric tons.
Country China had the maximum Production in metric tons among all 5 groups, and it was for 2018. The minimum Production in metric tons was observed in Country Laos for 2015.
Country China and Russia had the biggest gap of 13999.0 between the highest and lowest Production in metric tons found for 2018.
On average, the Country China had the highest Production in metric tons for all 5 groups 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018, and 2019. Whereas Bolivia had the lowest average Production in metric tons.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Production in metric tons on the Y-axis for 10 different Countrys for 5 groups 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018, and 2019 that are presented on the X-axis.
Out of all 5 groups, 2018 had the highest Production in metric tons for Country China and 2015 had the lowest Production in metric tons for Country Laos.
Among all the Countrys, 2018 had the highest Production in metric tons 14000.0 in Country China and lowest value 0.0 in Country Russia.
The maximum Production in metric tons for 2018 that was found in Country China was 14000.0 times larger than the minimum Production in metric tons observed in Country Russia.
Among all 5 groups, 2018 had the gap of 14000.0 between the maximum and minimum Production in metric tons observed in Country China and Russia respectively.

In case of Country China, 2018 had the highest Production in metric tons 14000.0 among the 5 groups and in Laos, 2015 had the lowest Production in metric tons 0.0. The second highest Production in metric tons 7500.0 was observed for 2018 in Country China.
On average, the Country China had the highest Production in metric tons for all 5 groups 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018, and 2019. Whereas Bolivia had the lowest average Production in metric tons.
